engChrName: This place sure is creepy.
engSearchText: This place sure is creepy.
jpnChrName: ……ここですね、 手配魔獣が潜んでいるというのは。
jpnSearchText:
……ここですね、
手配魔獣が潜んでいるというのは。

engChrName: I never knew there was a railway under the city.
engSearchText: I never knew there was a railway under the city.
jpnChrName: 廃路線、ですか。 こんな場所があったなんて……
jpnSearchText:
廃路線、ですか。
こんな場所があったなんて……

engChrName: It probably hasn't seen any use in over a decade.
engSearchText: It probably hasn't seen any use in over a decade.
jpnChrName: うん、廃棄されてから １０年以上は経っているのかな？
jpnSearchText:
うん、廃棄されてから
１０年以上は経っているのかな？

engChrName: That's correct, actually. Records indicate it was abandoned twelve years ago when the subway was expanded.
engSearchText:
That's correct, actually. Records indicate it was
abandoned twelve years ago when the subway
was expanded.
jpnChrName: データによりますと、１２年前の 地下鉄網拡張時に見直され廃棄──
jpnSearchText:
データによりますと、１２年前の
地下鉄網拡張時に見直され廃棄──

engChrName: It has been left untouched ever since.
engSearchText: It has been left untouched ever since.
jpnChrName: その後、管理の手も入らず ずっと放置された区画のようですね。
jpnSearchText:
その後、管理の手も入らず
ずっと放置された区画のようですね。

engChrName: And thanks to that, it's become a nesting ground for monsters.
engSearchText:
And thanks to that, it's become a nesting ground
for monsters.
jpnChrName: おかげで魔獣の巣窟にはなってるけど 滅多に人が入らない場所か。
jpnSearchText:
おかげで魔獣の巣窟にはなってるけど
滅多に人が入らない場所か。

engChrName: This is a good find. I'll be sure to make good use of this place when I'm doing my heists.
engSearchText:
This is a good find. I'll be sure to make good use of
this place when I'm doing my heists.
jpnChrName: ふむふむ、怪盗での活動時に 侵入ルートとしても使えるかも……
jpnSearchText:
ふむふむ、怪盗での活動時に
侵入ルートとしても使えるかも……

engChrName: I'm still a little puzzled as to why we were sent down here—particularly at a time like this.
engSearchText:
I'm still a little puzzled as to why we were sent down
here—particularly at a time like this.
jpnChrName: ……今更ですが、いいんでしょうか。 こんな時に関係ない要請なんて……
jpnSearchText:
……今更ですが、いいんでしょうか。
こんな時に関係ない要請なんて……

engChrName: They're carrying on like it's business as usual. It pisses me off.
engSearchText:
They're carrying on like it's business as usual.
It pisses me off.
jpnChrName: ハン、あのスカシ眼鏡にしちゃあ 空気が読めてなさそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
ハン、あのスカシ眼鏡にしちゃあ
空気が読めてなさそうだが……

engChrName: I think there's more to this case than it seems.
engSearchText: I think there's more to this case than it seems.
jpnChrName: いや……そうでも無さそうだぜ。
jpnSearchText: いや……そうでも無さそうだぜ。

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!
jpnChrName: あれは──！
jpnSearchText: あれは──！

engChrName: Dead monsters?!
engSearchText: Dead monsters?!
jpnChrName: 魔獣の死骸！？
jpnSearchText: 魔獣の死骸！？

engChrName: Those are clean cuts. Whoever did this is clearly a master of their craft.
engSearchText:
Those are clean cuts. Whoever did this is clearly a
master of their craft.
jpnChrName: 鮮やかな太刀筋…… かなりの腕の持ち主のようですね。
jpnSearchText:
鮮やかな太刀筋……
かなりの腕の持ち主のようですね。

engChrName: I wonder who it was.
engSearchText: I wonder who it was.
jpnChrName: どうやら先客がいるみたいね。 ……それも尋常じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら先客がいるみたいね。
……それも尋常じゃない。

engChrName: Could be a rival from another field, I guess.
engSearchText: Could be a rival from another field, I guess.
jpnChrName: ──ま、“異業他社”が 先行して入ってるのかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、“異業他社”が
先行して入ってるのかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: Either way, the CID gave us a job, so let's get it done.
engSearchText: Either way, the CID gave us a job, so let's get it done.
jpnChrName: 面倒くせぇがＣＩＤからのお達しだ、 とっとと片付けるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
面倒くせぇがＣＩＤからのお達しだ、
とっとと片付けるぞ。

engChrName: (...I see what's going on.)
engSearchText: (...I see what's going on.)
jpnChrName: （……なるほど。）
jpnSearchText: （……なるほど。）

engChrName: The monster's supposed to be a fair way inside, so let's pick up the pace.
engSearchText:
The monster's supposed to be a fair way inside, so
let's pick up the pace.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ早速、奥に向かおうか。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ早速、奥に向かおうか。

engChrName: E-Elaine!
engSearchText: E-Elaine!
jpnChrName: エ、エレインさんっ……！
jpnSearchText: エ、エレインさんっ……！

engChrName: I'm going to need you to fall back, Alvis! I'll take care of these.
engSearchText:
I'm going to need you to fall back, Alvis! I'll take care
of these.
jpnChrName: アルヴィス君はここで離脱しなさい。 私が片付けるから──！
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィス君はここで離脱しなさい。
私が片付けるから──！

engChrName: What? No! That's too much to handle—even for you!
engSearchText: What? No! That's too much to handle—even for you!
jpnChrName: だ、ダメです、 いくらエレインさんでも……！
jpnSearchText:
だ、ダメです、
いくらエレインさんでも……！

engChrName: Damn.
engSearchText: Damn.
jpnChrName: オイオイ……
jpnSearchText: オイオイ……

engChrName: She's incredible.
engSearchText: She's incredible.

engChrName: I recognize her. She's one of the guild's A-rank bracers, right?
engSearchText:
I recognize her. She's one of the guild's A-rank
bracers, right?
jpnChrName: あれって…… たしかギルドのＡ級の。
jpnSearchText:
あれって……
たしかギルドのＡ級の。

engChrName: ...Knew it.
engSearchText: ...Knew it.
jpnChrName: ………やっぱりか。
jpnSearchText: ………やっぱりか。

engChrName: Huh? What're you guys doing here?!
engSearchText: Huh? What're you guys doing here?!
jpnChrName: ってお前たちは……！
jpnSearchText: ってお前たちは……！

engChrName: I'm glad you're all right, Alvis!
engSearchText: I'm glad you're all right, Alvis!
jpnChrName: アルヴィスさんも…… ご無事でしたか！
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィスさんも……
ご無事でしたか！

engChrName: You can hang back for this one! We'll make sure she comes out of this unscathed!
engSearchText:
You can hang back for this one! We'll make sure she
comes out of this unscathed!
jpnChrName: あいつの事は任せろ！ お前さんはいったん退け！
jpnSearchText:
あいつの事は任せろ！
お前さんはいったん退け！

engChrName: Ugh...
engSearchText: Ugh...
jpnChrName: くっ……
jpnSearchText: くっ……

engChrName: Agnès, Judith, and I are gonna join up with Elaine. The rest of you can take on the other one!
engSearchText:
Agnès, Judith, and I are gonna join up with Elaine.
The rest of you can take on the other one!
jpnChrName: お前たちはもう一体を頼む！
jpnSearchText: お前たちはもう一体を頼む！

engChrName: Understood!
engSearchText: Understood!
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）……！
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）……！

engChrName: Leave it to us!
engSearchText: Leave it to us!
jpnChrName: お任せください！
jpnSearchText: お任せください！

engChrName: Sh-She's really going all out...
engSearchText: Sh-She's really going all out...
jpnChrName: す、凄い……ですが……
jpnSearchText: す、凄い……ですが……

engChrName: I've heard rumors about Beauty's Blade's strength, but they don't do her justice.
engSearchText:
I've heard rumors about Beauty's Blade's strength, but
they don't do her justice.
jpnChrName: 《剣の乙女》──噂は聞いてるけど とんでもないわね……！
jpnSearchText:
《剣の乙女》──噂は聞いてるけど
とんでもないわね……！

engChrName: You sure she needs backup?
engSearchText: You sure she needs backup?
jpnChrName: これなら一人でも勝てるんじゃない？
jpnSearchText: これなら一人でも勝てるんじゃない？

engChrName: Maybe not, but she's throwin' caution to the wind here.
engSearchText:
Maybe not, but she's throwin' caution to the
wind here.
jpnChrName: 勝てるかもしれねぇが…… 相当無茶な体の使い方をしてやがる。
jpnSearchText:
勝てるかもしれねぇが……
相当無茶な体の使い方をしてやがる。

engChrName: And I don't like it. Not one bit.
engSearchText: And I don't like it. Not one bit.
jpnChrName: ったく、あの馬鹿……！
jpnSearchText: ったく、あの馬鹿……！

engChrName: Elaine! We're here to help!
engSearchText: Elaine! We're here to help!
jpnChrName: エレインさん、聞いてください！
jpnSearchText: エレインさん、聞いてください！

engChrName: It's no use. She's completely absorbed in her fight.
engSearchText: It's no use. She's completely absorbed in her fight.
jpnChrName: ダメ── まったくこっちに気付いていないわ！
jpnSearchText:
ダメ──
まったくこっちに気付いていないわ！

engChrName: What's the plan? I don't think we can just jump into the fray.
engSearchText:
What's the plan? I don't think we can just jump into
the fray.
jpnChrName: どうするのよ？ あの中に飛び込むのはさすがに──
jpnSearchText:
どうするのよ？
あの中に飛び込むのはさすがに──

engChrName: You're hopeless, Van. It's a good thing I'm here to babysit you. You'd be a lost cause without me!
engSearchText:
You're hopeless, Van. It's a good thing I'm here to
babysit you. You'd be a lost cause without me!
jpnChrName: も～、ヴァンはダメダメなんだからぁ。 お姉さんのわたしがメンドーみないとね！
jpnSearchText:
も～、ヴァンはダメダメなんだからぁ。
お姉さんのわたしがメンドーみないとね！

engChrName: Shut up, Lainey! And whaddaya mean by 'babysit'?! I'm older than you!
engSearchText:
Shut up, Lainey! And whaddaya mean by 'babysit'?!
I'm older than you!
jpnChrName: うっせーエレ公！　オトコオンナ！ オレのほうがお兄ちゃんだろうが！
jpnSearchText:
うっせーエレ公！　オトコオンナ！
オレのほうがお兄ちゃんだろうが！

engChrName: *sigh* You two are such children. I suppose it's up to me to teach you how to behave.
engSearchText:
*sigh* You two are such children. I suppose it's up to
me to teach you how to behave.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、二人ともコドモだな。 ボクがお手本を見せてやらないと……
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、二人ともコドモだな。
ボクがお手本を見せてやらないと……

engChrName: Get a grip, Lainey!
engSearchText: Get a grip, Lainey!
jpnChrName: ──いい加減にしろ、エレ公ッ！！
jpnSearchText: ──いい加減にしろ、エレ公ッ！！
っ……！？

engChrName: Van? Why are you...?
engSearchText: Van? Why are you...?
jpnChrName: ヴァン、どうして……
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、どうして……

engChrName: Is this an off day or something? Your bladework's sloppy, and you're totally oblivious to your surroundings.
engSearchText:
Is this an off day or something? Your bladework's
sloppy, and you're totally oblivious to
your surroundings.
jpnChrName: 剣筋が荒れまくってんぞ、 麗しの《剣の乙女》はどこに行った！？
jpnSearchText:
剣筋が荒れまくってんぞ、
麗しの《剣の乙女》はどこに行った！？

engChrName: Now look over there!
engSearchText: Now look over there!
jpnChrName: もう少し周りを見ろ！
jpnSearchText: もう少し周りを見ろ！
あ……

engChrName: My assistants have that one on lock, so we'll lend you a hand here!
engSearchText:
My assistants have that one on lock, so we'll lend you
a hand here!
jpnChrName: あちらは任せろ！ こっちは俺たちで片付けるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
あちらは任せろ！
こっちは俺たちで片付けるぞ！

engChrName: ...Fine, then!
engSearchText: ...Fine, then!
jpnChrName: っ……了解よ！
jpnSearchText: っ……了解よ！

engChrName: You have my support!
engSearchText: You have my support!
jpnChrName: サポートします……！
jpnSearchText: サポートします……！

engChrName: We'll take it down in no time!
engSearchText: We'll take it down in no time!
jpnChrName: よーし、一気に行くわよ！
jpnSearchText: よーし、一気に行くわよ！

engChrName: Found  .
engSearchText:
Found
.
jpnChrName: 手配魔獣が{CC_ITEM=ITEM_ARTSDRIVER_019}を落とした。
jpnSearchText: 手配魔獣が{CC_ITEM=ITEM_ARTSDRIVER_019}を落とした。

engChrName: Found  .
engSearchText:
Found
.
jpnChrName: 手配魔獣が{CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_CP_200}を落とした。
jpnSearchText: 手配魔獣が{CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_CP_200}を落とした。

engChrName: Whew. We made short work of that one.
engSearchText: Whew. We made short work of that one.
jpnChrName: ハッ、こっちも片付いたぜ！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、こっちも片付いたぜ！

engChrName: Are you guys all right?!
engSearchText: Are you guys all right?!
jpnChrName: そちらは大丈夫ですか……！？
jpnSearchText: そちらは大丈夫ですか……！？
………………………………

engChrName: *sigh*...
engSearchText: *sigh*...
jpnChrName: ……ったく。
jpnSearchText: ……ったく。

engChrName: Listen, I know the incident in Creil came as a shock. It did for us all.
engSearchText:
Listen, I know the incident in Creil came as a shock.
It did for us all.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士としてクレイユの一件が ショックだったのは分かるが落ち着け。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士としてクレイユの一件が
ショックだったのは分かるが落ち着け。

engChrName: But you can't lose your cool like this. An A-rank bracer's gotta be calm and composed even when the going gets tough.
engSearchText:
But you can't lose your cool like this. An A-rank
bracer's gotta be calm and composed even when the
going gets tough.
jpnChrName: Ａ級の名が泣くってもんだろ、 らしくねえぞ。
jpnSearchText:
Ａ級の名が泣くってもんだろ、
らしくねえぞ。

engChrName: Who do you think you're...?
engSearchText: Who do you think you're...?
jpnChrName: ッ……お前に何が──
jpnSearchText: ッ……お前に何が──

engChrName: Take some deep breaths. Everything's gonna be fine.
engSearchText: Take some deep breaths. Everything's gonna be fine.
jpnChrName: 焦るな、じきに状況も見えてくる。
jpnSearchText: 焦るな、じきに状況も見えてくる。

engChrName: There'll be trying times ahead, sure, but we'll get through 'em. Just gotta take things one step at a time.
engSearchText:
There'll be trying times ahead, sure, but we'll get
through 'em. Just gotta take things one step at a time.
jpnChrName: 相当ヤバい事になりそうだが──それでも それぞれの立場と流儀で当たればいいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
相当ヤバい事になりそうだが──それでも
それぞれの立場と流儀で当たればいいだろ。

engChrName: And that goes for everyone here—not just you and me.
engSearchText:
And that goes for everyone here—not just you
and me.
jpnChrName: 俺たちにしても、お前たちにしてもな。
jpnSearchText: 俺たちにしても、お前たちにしてもな。

engChrName: ...I know that.
engSearchText: ...I know that.
jpnSearchText: ……るわよ………

engChrName: I know that! I'm trying SO hard to stay calm!
engSearchText: I know that! I'm trying SO hard to stay calm!
jpnChrName: そんなの分かってるわよ！！
jpnSearchText: そんなの分かってるわよ！！

engChrName: But even still, we...no, I couldn't protect them! I'm supposed to be a beacon of strength for the people. And I failed them!
engSearchText:
But even still, we...no, I couldn't protect them!
I'm supposed to be a beacon of strength for
the people. And I failed them!
jpnChrName: でも私たちは、私は……守れなかった！ 支える籠手として、Ａ級の肩書きを与えられながら！
jpnSearchText:
でも私たちは、私は……守れなかった！
支える籠手として、Ａ級の肩書きを与えられながら！

engChrName: If only I didn't let that man escape back in Langport...
engSearchText:
If only I didn't let that man escape back
in Langport...
jpnChrName: 煌都でだって幹部の一人を取り逃して……！
jpnSearchText: 煌都でだって幹部の一人を取り逃して……！

engChrName: No, even before that. If I just hadn't...
engSearchText: No, even before that. If I just hadn't...
jpnChrName: ……ううん、それよりも……もし私が…………
jpnSearchText: ……ううん、それよりも……もし私が…………

engChrName: Elaine...
engSearchText: Elaine...
jpnChrName: お前……
jpnSearchText: お前……

engChrName: Sounds like you're bottlin' something up.
engSearchText: Sounds like you're bottlin' something up.
jpnChrName: ……何があったのか分からねえが、 一人で抱え込んでんじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
……何があったのか分からねえが、
一人で抱え込んでんじゃねえ。

engChrName: If you need someone to lend an ear, I'm here for y—
engSearchText: If you need someone to lend an ear, I'm here for y—
jpnChrName: 必要なら俺だって力に──
jpnSearchText: 必要なら俺だって力に──

engChrName: Are you really?
engSearchText: Are you really?
jpnChrName: だったらどうして───！！
jpnSearchText: だったらどうして───！！

engChrName: Then tell me, Van. Why did you leave me?
engSearchText: Then tell me, Van. Why did you leave me?
jpnChrName: どうして傍に…… 居てくれなかったの……？
jpnSearchText:
どうして傍に……
居てくれなかったの……？

engChrName: ...I'm sorry. I don't know what came over me.
engSearchText: ...I'm sorry. I don't know what came over me.
jpnChrName: ……ごめんなさい。 何を言ってるのかしら、私……
jpnSearchText:
……ごめんなさい。
何を言ってるのかしら、私……

engChrName: We defeated both of our targets, and we may not have done so without your timely aid.
engSearchText:
We defeated both of our targets, and we may not
have done so without your timely aid.
jpnChrName: 目標２体は対処完了…… 貴方たちのおかげで助かったわ。
jpnSearchText:
目標２体は対処完了……
貴方たちのおかげで助かったわ。

engChrName: I apologize for how I treated you back there, Alvis. You fought admirably.
engSearchText:
I apologize for how I treated you back there, Alvis.
You fought admirably.
jpnChrName: ──アルヴィス君もごめんなさい。 よくやったわね。
jpnSearchText:
──アルヴィス君もごめんなさい。
よくやったわね。

engChrName: Elaine...
engSearchText: Elaine...
jpnChrName: エレインさん……
jpnSearchText: エレインさん……

engChrName: ...I'm going to take my leave now. I still have other work to do.
engSearchText:
...I'm going to take my leave now. I still have other
work to do.
jpnChrName: ……もう行くわ。 まだ片付けておく仕事がある。
jpnSearchText:
……もう行くわ。
まだ片付けておく仕事がある。

engChrName: I'll make certain you get compensated for your portion of the work.
engSearchText:
I'll make certain you get compensated for your
portion of the work.
jpnChrName: 貴方たちの取り分は きちんと処理しておくから。
jpnSearchText:
貴方たちの取り分は
きちんと処理しておくから。

engChrName: ...The loss of Dingo Brad was nothing short of a tragedy.
engSearchText:
...The loss of Dingo Brad was nothing short of
a tragedy.
jpnChrName: ……ディンゴ・ブラッドさんは残念だったわ。
jpnSearchText: ……ディンゴ・ブラッドさんは残念だったわ。

engChrName: There were times when he beat us to the punch, but his intelligence proved indispensable on a number of occasions.
engSearchText:
There were times when he beat us to the punch, but
his intelligence proved indispensable on a number
of occasions.
jpnChrName: 出し抜かれることもあったけど 情報屋としてお世話になったことも多かった。
jpnSearchText:
出し抜かれることもあったけど
情報屋としてお世話になったことも多かった。

engChrName: ...Same for me, too.
engSearchText: ...Same for me, too.
jpnChrName: ……そうか……
jpnSearchText: ……そうか……

engChrName: If you can, try and keep an eye on that Tyrell Times reporter.
engSearchText:
If you can, try and keep an eye on that Tyrell
Times reporter.
jpnChrName: それと……タイレル通信の記者さんのことは 気に掛けておいてあげて。
jpnSearchText:
それと……タイレル通信の記者さんのことは
気に掛けておいてあげて。

engChrName: She's getting dangerously close to the criminal underworld, and she doesn't seem to be taking any of my warnings to heart.
engSearchText:
She's getting dangerously close to the criminal
underworld, and she doesn't seem to be taking any of
my warnings to heart.
jpnChrName: “裏”にまで踏み込もうとしてるみたいだけど ……私の言葉じゃ届かなかったから。
jpnSearchText:
“裏”にまで踏み込もうとしてるみたいだけど
……私の言葉じゃ届かなかったから。

engChrName: Alvis, we're leaving.
engSearchText: Alvis, we're leaving.
jpnChrName: 行きましょう──アルヴィス君。
jpnSearchText: 行きましょう──アルヴィス君。

engChrName: W-Wait!
engSearchText: W-Wait!
jpnChrName: ま、待ってください！
jpnSearchText: ま、待ってください！

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.
jpnChrName: ハン……
jpnSearchText: ハン……

engChrName: She's just as strong as everyone claims.
engSearchText: She's just as strong as everyone claims.
jpnChrName: ……噂以上の腕前みたいだね。 でも……
jpnSearchText:
……噂以上の腕前みたいだね。
でも……

engChrName: But I'm a little worried about her now...
engSearchText: But I'm a little worried about her now...
jpnChrName: はい、ちょっと心配です……
jpnSearchText: はい、ちょっと心配です……

engChrName: (What could have compelled her to be so reckless in that fight? Also...)
engSearchText:
(What could have compelled her to be so reckless in
that fight? Also...)
jpnChrName: （……どうしてあそこまで……   …………それに…………………）
jpnSearchText:
（……どうしてあそこまで……
…………それに…………………）

engChrName: Well, I guess we know why that presidential aide sent us down here.
engSearchText:
Well, I guess we know why that presidential aide sent
us down here.
jpnChrName: ま、噂の補佐官さんの思惑は 何となく分かったけど……
jpnSearchText:
ま、噂の補佐官さんの思惑は
何となく分かったけど……

engChrName: So what's next? Should we go check up on that reporter?
engSearchText:
So what's next? Should we go check up on
that reporter?
jpnChrName: 無事オーダーを片付けたとはいえ、 女記者さんは放っておいていいの？
jpnSearchText:
無事オーダーを片付けたとはいえ、
女記者さんは放っておいていいの？

engChrName: That might be prudent. If she is closing in on the criminal underworld, then she can only be headed to one place.
engSearchText:
That might be prudent. If she is closing in on the
criminal underworld, then she can only be headed to
one place.
jpnChrName: “裏”に踏み込もうとしている── もしや“あの場所”にでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
“裏”に踏み込もうとしている──
もしや“あの場所”にでしょうか？

engChrName: The so-called 'Blacklight District,' correct?
engSearchText: The so-called 'Blacklight District,' correct?
jpnChrName: 確か《黒芒街》……だっけ？
jpnSearchText: 確か《黒芒街》……だっけ？

engChrName: Yeah. If she's there, we gotta drag her out. That place is crawlin' with criminals of all shapes and sizes.
engSearchText:
Yeah. If she's there, we gotta drag her out. That place
is crawlin' with criminals of all shapes and sizes.
jpnChrName: ああ…… この街で“裏”と言えばな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
この街で“裏”と言えばな。

engChrName: Wonder how she found out about that place, though. Dingo never would've told her about it or shared its location with her.
engSearchText:
Wonder how she found out about that place, though.
Dingo never would've told her about it or shared its
location with her.
jpnChrName: ディンゴは過保護だったから 存在や行き方も教えてねぇ筈だが……
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴは過保護だったから
存在や行き方も教えてねぇ筈だが……

engChrName: Well, there's more than one way to crack an egg.
engSearchText: Well, there's more than one way to crack an egg.
jpnChrName: ……ですがその気になれば 迫る方法は幾らでもありそうです。
jpnSearchText:
……ですがその気になれば
迫る方法は幾らでもありそうです。

engChrName: Right. She could have found out from some of her other connections. I'm worried about her...
engSearchText:
Right. She could have found out from some of her
other connections. I'm worried about her...
jpnChrName: ええ、マリエルさん、 かなり思い詰めていましたし……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、マリエルさん、
かなり思い詰めていましたし……

engChrName: Then let's find her. Can't hurt to check and see if she's all right.
engSearchText:
Then let's find her. Can't hurt to check and see if
she's all right.
jpnChrName: ハン、子守のつもりはねえが 改めて行ってみるかよ？
jpnSearchText:
ハン、子守のつもりはねえが
改めて行ってみるかよ？

engChrName: Yeah, I agree.
engSearchText: Yeah, I agree.
jpnChrName: そうだな、念のため見ておくか。
jpnSearchText: そうだな、念のため見ておくか。

engChrName: We should head straight there. There's no time to waste.
engSearchText:
We should head straight there. There's no time
to waste.
jpnChrName: 他の場所に行ってる時間はねぇ…… このまま黒芒街に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
他の場所に行ってる時間はねぇ……
このまま黒芒街に向かうぞ。

engChrName: Quest Last Stop―Destruction! completed!
engSearchText: Quest Last Stop―Destruction! completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【地下鉄廃路線の手配魔獣】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>地下鉄廃路線の手配魔獣<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: Head to the Blacklight District?
engSearchText: Head to the Blacklight District?
jpnChrName: 黒芒街に向かいますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>黒芒街に向かいますか？

engChrName: Commencing proximity probe.
engSearchText: Commencing proximity probe.
jpnChrName: 周辺ノ探査ヲ開始。
jpnSearchText: 周辺ノ探査ヲ開始。

engChrName: Response found! Heat signature detected!
engSearchText: Response found! Heat signature detected!
jpnChrName: 発見ハッケン！　熱源反応ヲ感知！
jpnSearchText: 発見ハッケン！　熱源反応ヲ感知！

engChrName: Response found! Heat signature detected!
engSearchText: Response found! Heat signature detected!
jpnChrName: 発見ハッケン！ 熱源反応ヲ感知！
jpnSearchText:
発見ハッケン！
熱源反応ヲ感知！

engChrName: There he is!
engSearchText: There he is!
jpnChrName: あれは……！
jpnSearchText: あれは……！

engChrName: GRR...
engSearchText: GRR...
jpnChrName: ＧＲＲＲＲ……！
jpnSearchText: ＧＲＲＲＲ……！

engChrName: XEROS! Oh, I'm so glad we found you!
engSearchText: XEROS! Oh, I'm so glad we found you!
jpnChrName: ＸＥＲＯＳ君、 ようやく見つけました！
jpnSearchText:
ＸＥＲＯＳ君、
ようやく見つけました！

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！！

engChrName: What a relief.
engSearchText: What a relief.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、よかったです！
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、よかったです！

engChrName: Heh. You're looking well, buddy!
engSearchText: Heh. You're looking well, buddy!
jpnChrName: ハッ、元気そうじゃねえか！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、元気そうじゃねえか！

engChrName: I get it now. So you picked up Quatre's scent, and that led you here.
engSearchText:
I get it now. So you picked up Quatre's scent, and
that led you here.
jpnChrName: そうか……こっちの方にカトルの “匂い”らしきものを感じ取ったのか。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……こっちの方にカトルの
“匂い”らしきものを感じ取ったのか。

engChrName: But the scent ends here, and there's nothing underground. Did we get all that right?
engSearchText:
But the scent ends here, and there's
nothing underground. Did we get all that right?
jpnChrName: ですが、“匂い”はこの辺りだけで 奥の方には感じられないんですね？
jpnSearchText:
ですが、“匂い”はこの辺りだけで
奥の方には感じられないんですね？

engChrName: GRR... RUFF!
engSearchText: GRR... RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＧＲＲ……ＷＯＮ．
jpnSearchText: ＧＲＲ……ＷＯＮ．

engChrName: Well, that's strange... What's going on?
engSearchText: Well, that's strange... What's going on?
jpnChrName: ど、どういう事なのかしら？
jpnSearchText: ど、どういう事なのかしら？

engChrName: I suspect there's a demon stone somewhere in the vicinity. That must be the origin of the scent.
engSearchText:
I suspect there's a demon stone somewhere in
the vicinity. That must be the origin of the scent.
jpnChrName: 察するに例の魔石が 何処かに潜んでいるのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
察するに例の魔石が
何処かに潜んでいるのでしょう。

engChrName: These stones appear to be similar in nature to the demon spheres. That must be why they could sense Quatre through it.
engSearchText:
These stones appear to be similar in nature to the
demon spheres. That must be why they could sense
Quatre through it.
jpnChrName: そしてどうやら魔石は魔球の“眷族”── ゆえにカトルの気配を感じたのだろう。
jpnSearchText:
そしてどうやら魔石は魔球の“眷族”──
ゆえにカトルの気配を感じたのだろう。

engChrName: Correct. I can detect his unique spiritual wavelength.
engSearchText: Correct. I can detect his unique spiritual wavelength.
jpnChrName: 肯定──カトル固有の 霊子パターンヲ間接的ニ検知シタ。
jpnSearchText:
肯定──カトル固有の
霊子パターンヲ間接的ニ検知シタ。

engChrName: Continued caution is advised.
engSearchText: Continued caution is advised.
jpnChrName: 警戒レベルノ維持ヲ推奨スル。
jpnSearchText: 警戒レベルノ維持ヲ推奨スル。

engChrName: Ugh. These stones are probably gonna be just as much of a pain to take out as the spheres.
engSearchText:
Ugh. These stones are probably gonna be just as
much of a pain to take out as the spheres.
jpnChrName: チッ……親玉同様、 けったくそ悪ぃ石コロじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……親玉同様、
けったくそ悪ぃ石コロじゃねえか。

engChrName: A distinct possibility.
engSearchText: A distinct possibility.
jpnChrName: ええ、まるで悪しき意思を 同じく持ち合わせているような……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、まるで悪しき意思を
同じく持ち合わせているような……

engChrName: Regardless, if we can determine where this one is lurking, we have ways of drawing it out of the shadows.
engSearchText:
Regardless, if we can determine where this one is
lurking, we have ways of drawing it out of
the shadows.
jpnChrName: ですが潜んでいるのが確実なら 幾らでもやりようはあるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ですが潜んでいるのが確実なら
幾らでもやりようはあるでしょう。

engChrName: Well, what are we waiting for? Let's smash that stone so we can get Quatre back!
engSearchText:
Well, what are we waiting for? Let's smash that stone
so we can get Quatre back!
jpnChrName: はいっ、カトルさんを助けるためにも すぐに撃破してしまいましょう！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、カトルさんを助けるためにも
すぐに撃破してしまいましょう！

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: Hmm? What is it, XEROS?
engSearchText: Hmm? What is it, XEROS?
jpnChrName: え、え…… ＸＥＲＯＳ、どうしたの？
jpnSearchText:
え、え……
ＸＥＲＯＳ、どうしたの？

engChrName: It looks like they have something to tell you.
engSearchText: It looks like they have something to tell you.
jpnChrName: 何か言いたそうですけど……
jpnSearchText: 何か言いたそうですけど……

engChrName: XEROS is granting you temporary authorization to execute their offensive programs.
engSearchText:
XEROS is granting you temporary authorization to
execute their offensive programs.
jpnChrName: 攻性プログラムノ使用判断ヲ 一時的ニ委ネル要請ヲシテイル。
jpnSearchText:
攻性プログラムノ使用判断ヲ
一時的ニ委ネル要請ヲシテイル。

engChrName: They want to be of service in rescuing Quatre.
engSearchText: They want to be of service in rescuing Quatre.
jpnChrName: カトル救出ニ役立テテ欲シイトノコト。
jpnSearchText: カトル救出ニ役立テテ欲シイトノコト。

engChrName: W-Wait, you want me to give you commands in battle like Quatre does?
engSearchText:
W-Wait, you want me to give you commands in
battle like Quatre does?
jpnChrName: そ、それって、わたしが ＸＥＲＯＳに戦闘で指示を……？
jpnSearchText:
そ、それって、わたしが
ＸＥＲＯＳに戦闘で指示を……？

engChrName: Sure sounds like it. You've handled military monsters before, so I'd say you're more than qualified.
engSearchText:
Sure sounds like it. You've handled military monsters
before, so I'd say you're more than qualified.
jpnChrName: みたいだな──いいんじゃねえか、 軍用魔獣を扱ったこともあるんだろう？
jpnSearchText:
みたいだな──いいんじゃねえか、
軍用魔獣を扱ったこともあるんだろう？

engChrName: Umm... I mean, I've only done that in training...
engSearchText: Umm... I mean, I've only done that in training...
jpnChrName: えと、はい……戦士団の訓練で それなりくらいは、ですけど。
jpnSearchText:
えと、はい……戦士団の訓練で
それなりくらいは、ですけど。

engChrName: ...but if you trust me, then I'll do my best. Let's save your master together!
engSearchText:
...but if you trust me, then I'll do my best. Let's save
your master together!
jpnChrName: うん、分かったよ。 いっしょにご主人様を助けようね！
jpnSearchText:
うん、分かったよ。
いっしょにご主人様を助けようね！

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＷＯＮ！！
jpnSearchText: ＷＯＮ！！

engChrName: Heehee. I'm sure we don't have anything to worry about if Feri's in charge!
engSearchText:
Heehee. I'm sure we don't have anything to worry
about if Feri's in charge!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、フェリちゃんなら なんの心配もいらなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、フェリちゃんなら
なんの心配もいらなさそうですね。

engChrName: Maaan... Why couldn't it have given me authorization?
engSearchText:
Maaan... Why couldn't it have given
me authorization?
jpnChrName: チッ、そういう事なら 俺が使ってやっても良かったのによ。
jpnSearchText:
チッ、そういう事なら
俺が使ってやっても良かったのによ。

engChrName: Maybe if you weren't so unbelievably untrustworthy, you'd have a shot.
engSearchText:
Maybe if you weren't so unbelievably untrustworthy,
you'd have a shot.
jpnChrName: 拗ねない、拗ねない。 ……それじゃ、早速始めましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
拗ねない、拗ねない。
……それじゃ、早速始めましょうか？

engChrName: All right, gang. Let's smoke that stone out!
engSearchText: All right, gang. Let's smoke that stone out!
jpnChrName: ああ── このまま炙り出してやるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ──
このまま炙り出してやるぞ！

engChrName: Feri can temporarily use  .
engSearchText:
Feri can temporarily use
.
jpnChrName: フェリが一時的に{CC_SKILL=SKILL_QUATRE_CRAFT_03}を修得した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>フェリが一時的に{CC_SKILL=SKILL_QUATRE_CRAFT_03}<C1>を修得した。

engChrName: A-An underground railroad?! Are we even allowed to be here?!
engSearchText:
A-An underground railroad?! Are we even allowed to
be here?!
jpnChrName: ち、地下鉄～っ！？ いいの、こんなところ走って！？
jpnSearchText:
ち、地下鉄～っ！？
いいの、こんなところ走って！？

engChrName: Maybe not, but it's not like anyone else uses it anymore!
engSearchText:
Maybe not, but it's not like anyone else uses
it anymore!
jpnChrName: 今は使われていない廃路線だ！ 勝手に車で入ったのはギリギリアウトかもな！
jpnSearchText:
今は使われていない廃路線だ！
勝手に車で入ったのはギリギリアウトかもな！

engChrName: I know of an exit near Trion Tower. Buckle up, 'cause I'm about to let her rip!
engSearchText:
I know of an exit near Trion Tower. Buckle up, 'cause
I'm about to let her rip!
jpnChrName: トリオンタワー方面の出口にアテがある── 飛ばすから舌噛まないようにしとけよ！
jpnSearchText:
トリオンタワー方面の出口にアテがある──
飛ばすから舌噛まないようにしとけよ！

engChrName: A-All right!
engSearchText: A-All right!
jpnChrName: は、はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: は、はいっ……！

engChrName: Whoa! There's another car down here, and there's a couple of hotties in the back!
engSearchText:
Whoa! There's another car down here, and there's a
couple of hotties in the back!
jpnChrName: おお、なんだあの車は？ 上玉をのせてやがったぞ！
jpnSearchText:
おお、なんだあの車は？
上玉をのせてやがったぞ！

engChrName: Hell yeah! That thing's got some awesome parts on it. This is our lucky day!
engSearchText:
Hell yeah! That thing's got some awesome parts on it.
This is our lucky day!
jpnChrName: ヒャッハー、いい部品使ってんじゃねえか！ 待てやコラ～！！
jpnSearchText:
ヒャッハー、いい部品使ってんじゃねえか！
待てやコラ～！！

engChrName: Th-There's another car on our tail!
engSearchText: Th-There's another car on our tail!
jpnChrName: く、車が追いかけてきましたが……！？
jpnSearchText: く、車が追いかけてきましたが……！？

engChrName: Must be some scumbags from the Blacklight District. Well, they ain't gonna catch ME!
engSearchText:
Must be some scumbags from the Blacklight District.
Well, they ain't gonna catch ME!
jpnChrName: 黒芒街のならず者どもだな…… ハッ、追いつけるもんなら追いついてみやがれ！
jpnSearchText:
黒芒街のならず者どもだな……
ハッ、追いつけるもんなら追いついてみやがれ！

engChrName: Make them eat our dust!
engSearchText: Make them eat our dust!
jpnChrName: いっけぇ、お兄さん～！！
jpnSearchText: いっけぇ、お兄さん～！！
